title: Initial Assessment
description: Complete an initial assessment to determine eligibility for immigration programs.

subtasks.title: Create Profile
subtasks.description: Set up your account and complete your profile details.

subtasks.title: Basic Eligibility Check
subtasks.description: System evaluation of your basic eligibility criteria.

subtasks.title: Preliminary Score Calculation
subtasks.description: Initial scoring based on your profile information.

title: Document Preparation
description: Gather and prepare all required documentation for your application.

subtasks.title: Educational Credentials
subtasks.description: Degrees, diplomas, transcripts, and educational assessments.

subtasks.title: Language Proficiency Tests
subtasks.description: IELTS, TOEFL, or other approved language tests.

title: Application Submission
description: Submit your application to immigration authorities.

subtasks.title: Application Form Completion
subtasks.description: Fill out all required application forms.

subtasks.title: Fee Payment
subtasks.description: Pay required application and processing fees.

subtasks.title: Submission Confirmation
subtasks.description: Receive confirmation of your submitted application.

title: Application Processing
description: Your application is processed by immigration authorities.

subtasks.title: Initial Review
subtasks.description: Basic completeness check of your application.

subtasks.title: Detailed Assessment
subtasks.description: Thorough evaluation of your qualifications and eligibility.

subtasks.title: Interview (if required)
subtasks.description: Attend an interview with immigration officials if requested.

title: Decision and Next Steps
description: Receive a decision on your application and proceed with next steps.

subtasks.title: Application Decision
subtasks.description: Receive approval, rejection, or request for additional information.

subtasks.title: Visa/Permit Issuance
subtasks.description: If approved, receive your visa or resident permit.

subtasks.title: Pre-Arrival Preparation
subtasks.description: Prepare for travel and arrival in your destination country.

subtasks.title: Post-Arrival Settlement
subtasks.description: Complete required registration and settlement procedures after arrival.
